processGroups.comments: This is a state machine for the various dependent data retrieval, ingestion, and processing jobs this processor group completes.

labels.label: This creates a zip file in the archive directory containing all the downloaded and ETL'd data.

processors.name: Save the ZIP Archive to HDFS
Set the ZIP Filename to Archive
Manually Archive Data in Staging Area

processGroups.comments: Ingest and process the data retrieved during the previous retrieval phases using Hive. The Hive script is retrieved via HDFS and streamed to Hive to process.

entry.value: select report_date from raw_hosts where datediff(current_date, report_date) < ${days} group by report_date order by report_date desc

processGroups.comments: Retrieve asset vulnerability data from Qualys. This processor group downloads vulnerability detection data from Qualys. These are the findings that Qualys scanners and agents found on assets it scanned.
